description:
Olminu is a young magician of the http://anidb.net/ch86428 [Octobrists]. She is charged with watching http://anidb.net/ch79268 [Toyohisa]`s group of http://anidb.net/ch86429 [Drifters]. She seems to be quite incompetent at reconnaissance, and is terrified of the Drifters she must follow.
After she is discovered and kidnapped by Toyohisa`s group, she tells them the story of the Drifters and http://anidb.net/ch86430 [Ends]. She is often used as comic relief, shown in a generally incompetent, powerless, and cowardly way, and is a frequent target of sexual harassment by http://anidb.net/ch79269 [Nobunaga], but can be helpful due to her skills in sorcery. Olminu can also serve as an spectator to the story, with the narrative enlightening plot elements through her perception. Her codename is Sem.
Source: Wikipedia, edited.
name: Olminu
